author.name: The viral web
author.description: A quasi-structured, weekly or biweekly discussion of published medico-scientific literature that I find the most interesting and relevant to the world at large. news.title: The Body's Ecosystem
news.summary: Research on the human microbiome is booming, and scientists have moved from simply taking stock of gut flora to understanding the influence of microbes throughout the body.

news.title: Penis Microbes Linked to Increased Risk of HIV Infection
